trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_SEQ_00<tab>Ryne seems troubled by the sight of you.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Y'shtola at the Crystarium.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the manager of suites in the Pendants.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>The end to Light's dominion over this world is fast at hand.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>When all of this is over, it would mean a lot to me if we could go and visit Tesleen's grave together. I have such a lot to tell her...
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_THANCRED_000_010<tab>Perhaps their ministrations were not as thorough as I thought. Or perhaps I was a touch too reckless.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_URIANGER_000_015<tab>Once more shall the night share equal dominion over the firmament. And yet our travails are far from over...
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_YSHTOLA_000_020<tab>Is this not the moment Emet-Selch usually chooses to descend upon us? Whatever will we do without his feigned praise and backhanded compliments?
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_RYNE_000_030<tab>Are you feeling all right, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? After you defeated the Lightwarden, I could swear I saw its aether─
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_RYNE_000_031<tab>Uh...never mind. I'm still getting used to my powers. It's probably nothing.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_RYNE_000_032<tab>I'm just relieved I was right about where the Warden was hiding.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_RYNE_000_033<tab>The last one is hiding in Kholusia, isn't it? I can't feel it from here, believe it or not...
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_RYNE_000_034<tab>But perhaps we should head back to the Crystarium first. We have a lot to tell the Exarch...and I think we could all do with some rest.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_YSHTOLA_000_035<tab>She sees it too, then.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_RYNE_000_040<tab>Y'shtola said she needed to speak with us. It sounded rather urgent.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_YSHTOLA_000_050<tab>The others are with the Exarch. Before we join them, there is something I wish to confirm.

TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_YSHTOLA_000_51<tab>Tell me, Ryne─have you noticed anything peculiar about <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s appearance of late? Anything at all? Speak freely. <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> won't mind.

TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_RYNE_000_052<tab>Well...since Minfilia bequeathed her power to me, I've been able to see the Light inside <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>...though I didn't think anything of it at first. But after we defeated the Warden in Amh Araeng, I realized something was wrong.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_RYNE_000_053<tab>You've absorbed its aether, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. And the Light within you has grown monstrous.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_YSHTOLA_000_054<tab>Then it is as I suspected.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_YSHTOLA_000_055<tab>How are you feeling?
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_YSHTOLA_000_056<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_YSHTOLA_000_057<tab>If naught is done, this will only get worse.

TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_YSHTOLA_000_058<tab>Ryne─with the power of the Oracle, you have gained some measure of control over Light, have you not? Is there anything you can do for <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>?
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_RYNE_000_059<tab>Extinguishing it is out of the question. Even at her strongest, Minfilia could only hold back the Light.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_RYNE_000_060<tab>I <var 1A 02 /var>might<var 1A 01 /var> be able to suppress it...but I don't know for how long.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_YSHTOLA_000_061<tab>Then we have no choice but to rely on Urianger and his secrets.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_YSHTOLA_000_062<tab>If the next battle is to be the last, you may yet be able to play your part. But you will need all of your strength.

TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_YSHTOLA_000_063<tab>I will discuss strategy with the others and see that everything is made ready for our departure. You are to return to your chambers and rest until then. Understood?
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_A1_000_001<tab>...Understood.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_A1_000_002<tab>I'm <var 1A 02 /var>fine<var 1A 01 /var>. Let me help.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_A1_000_003<tab>Yes, Mother...
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_YSHTOLA_000_064<tab>Good. Whether you want it or not, you have most certainly earned some respite.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_YSHTOLA_000_065<tab>This is not the time for false bravado. Should your condition worsen, it could have dire consequences for us all.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_YSHTOLA_000_066<tab>Now please, return to your chambers and rest.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_YSHTOLA_000_067<tab>Hah. None of that cheek, or I will take you across my knee.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_YSHTOLA_000_068<tab>Now, off with you to the Pendants. We will call for you when the time comes.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS_000_070<tab>Is everything all right, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>? You don't seem quite yourself.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS_000_071<tab>Perhaps a hot meal and a freshly made bed will improve matters. Your room is ready, if you'd care to retire?
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_Q2_000_000<tab>Retire to your quarters?
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS_000_072<tab>Very good. If you should have need of anything─anything at all─pray do not hesitate to call.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_MYSTERYVOICE_000_900<tab>No, this isn't right.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_MYSTERYVOICE_000_901<tab>It would need to be later. After the liberation of Ala Mhigo, perhaps...
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_BLUECLOTHESMAN_000_902<tab>Please tell me you've finished.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_BLUECLOTHESMAN_000_903<tab>We have to go. They'll be upon us any moment.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_MYSTERYVOICE_000_904<tab>Very well. Where to next, then?
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_BLUECLOTHESMAN_000_905<tab>Let's just worry about getting out of the city, and pray the airship is still in one piece.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_BLUECLOTHESMAN_000_906<tab>Anywhere we go from here will just be more of the same.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_BLUECLOTHESMAN_000_907<tab>Gods. By the sound of that last one, I reckon the knights twelve might be the knights' rubble now.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_MYSTERYVOICE_000_908<tab>Is there nothing else we can do?
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_BLUECLOTHESMAN_000_909<tab>Do? Look around you─this isn't war.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_BLUECLOTHESMAN_000_910<tab>It's a sickness, and it's spread to every corner of Eorzea. The city-states are in disarray, and by all accounts the Far East's faring no better.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_BLUECLOTHESMAN_000_911<tab>There'll be nothing left of us when this is over.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_BLUECLOTHESMAN_000_912<tab>This world is beyond saving...
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_BLUECLOTHESMAN_000_913<tab>I never tire of that story. When the hero swoops in astride a white dragon to save the little girl...
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_BLUECLOTHESMAN_000_914<tab>I could die happy knowing someone like that was still around.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_MYSTERYVOICE_000_916<tab>Indeed. But not today. Not while our message remains undelivered.
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_MYSTERYVOICE_000_917<tab>Have faith, my friend: we <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> find <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>...
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_Q10_000_920<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_A10_000_921<tab>What a peculiar dream...
TEXT_LUCKMD117_03622_A10_000_923<tab>Was that...the past?
